definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

pinyin: Xin1 jia1 po1 Guo2 li4 Da4 xue2

sentences.english: Before returning to PRC in 1997, HK was already doing very well compared to SG.
sentences.chinese: 1997年香港回归前，它已经比新加坡做得好了。

sentences.english: The top city in Asia is Singapore, at no. 26.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡作为亚洲最佳城市，排名26。

sentences.english: Vanda miss joaquim is the national flower of singapore.
sentences.chinese: 卓锦万代兰是新加坡的国花。

sentences.english: In Singapore, the merlion is the symbolic of the country.
sentences.chinese: 在新加坡，鱼尾狮是这个国家的象征。

sentences.english: The Singapore government is famous for its successful policy that everyone has its own house.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡政府因住者有其屋政策的成功实施而闻名于世。

sentences.english: The cuisine of Singapore can indicate the ethnic diversity of the culture of Singa­pore.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡的美食展现了新加坡文化中的种族多样性。

sentences.english: The cuisine of Singapore can indicate the ethnic diversity of the culture of Singa­pore.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡的美食展现了新加坡文化中的种族多样性。

sentences.english: Some of the big Singapore hotels here include the Marina Mandarin, The Oriental and Pan Pacific.
sentences.chinese: 一些大酒店新加坡这里包括滨华，东方和泛太平洋。

sentences.english: A visit to Singapore is incomplete without a look at Chinatown.
sentences.chinese: 如果没去看过牛车水，那就不算真正到过新加坡。

sentences.english: This is Thomas Watt, the manager of The E-Commerce Transactions Company in Singapore.
sentences.chinese: 这是托马斯的电子经理瓦电子商务交易在新加坡公司。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and San Francisco on SQ.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡航空公司来回香港至三藩市机票。

sentences.english: We went to NUS( the National University of Singapore), which was one of classical universitys of the world.
sentences.chinese: 我们去了新加坡国立大学，是世界一流的大学。

sentences.english: Others are decamping to London or Singapore.
sentences.chinese: 其他人则想去伦敦或新加坡。

sentences.english: The background is the Singapore International School in WCH.
sentences.chinese: 背后是黄竹坑的新加坡国际学校。

sentences.english: Singapore's Whampoa Road was named in memory of which businessman?
sentences.chinese: 新加坡黄埔路是为了纪念哪一位商人而命名的？

sentences.english: Singapore, when I just came here, you were the transpiration with all purities.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡，我初来的时候，你是一尘不染的通透。

definition: Indonesia (abbr. for 印度尼西亞|印度尼西亚)
Sydney, capital of New South Wales, Australia
